Artist ran on through the desert, even running through a cactus bed! A full=
 of stickers Artist ran up a hill and looked around. He didn't realize that=
 the desert was sooo big! He bounded from rock to rock, his fury building! =
Until finally, he was at peace... He was acting like...a wolf. Artist lay d=
own on the cooling desert sand and licked his wounds, scratching at the sti=
ckers. As his mech fluid ran down his back from all of the cuts from the ca=
ctus bed, he curled up and went to sleep...

Plintissa walked through the d=
esert until finally, she was too tired to walk another step. So she found a=
 rock to lay under for shelter, the sun would be up again in the morning, a=
nd maybe her comm systems and scanners would be back online again...

Deemo=
s walked right up to the bases doors and knocked on them...
